page.title: Forensic Pathology Teaching Tool
page.subtitle: About this Project
page.text: This resource has been created to give you a basic understanding of forensic pathology. It will guide you through the forensic process from the initial crime scene to the autopsy, toxicology and histology.
Following this guidance you will begin your own case, trying to ascertain the cause of death. I hope you enjoy using this as much as we did making it.
